Name: SEARCH ALL - WORMS
About the game: SEARCH ALL - WORMS is a Hidden Object game where you have to find all the worms in a large area. Worms will be located in a variety of places, from the most visible to the barely noticeable places. The entire game location looks animated due to the animation elements. Find all the worms! Don't let them go unnoticed :) Key features: - Animation elements on the location; - 100 worms to find; - Nice soundtrack; - The gameplay can be interrupted at any time, and the game will automatically save the result; - Implemented hints! If you find it difficult to find an item, use the hint!
